title: 98/676/EC: Commission Decision of 17 November 1998 recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of KIF 3535 (mepanipyrim), imazamox (AC 299263), DE 570 (florasulam), fluazolat (JV 485), Coniothyrium minitans and benzoic acid in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market (notified under document number C(1998) 3514) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 November 1998 recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of KIF 3535 (mepanipyrim), imazamox (AC 299263), DE 570 (florasulam), fluazolat (JV 485), Coniothyrium minitans and benzoic acid in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market (notified under document number C(1998) 3514) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/676/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 November 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 230, 19. 8. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 191, 7. 7. 1998, p. 50.
